#summary This wiki describe the Protein dataset on the Desktop Tool

= Protein =

The figure shows [SearchTab Search Tab] using the Protein as main dataset. 

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/30.jpg

In this dataset the quick search will be performed over the *Protein Name* (AAPK2_PIG), *Accession NUmber* (Q28948), *EC* (2.7.11.1) and *Long  Name* fields including the use of [http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/pattern-matching.html SQL regular expressions].

On this !DataSet you are able to use other biological objects as [Constrains Constrains]. The available !DataSet to be used as constrains are: Taxonomy, Ontology, Gene, !UniRef Entry, !DrugBank and KEGG Enzymes.

The [SearchTab Search Tab] will produce a new [ListTab List Tab], next figure, with the obtained results.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/31.jpg

The Protein complete description window

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/32.jpg

In the !ComboBox the *Protein's* linked !DataSets will be showed as in the next figure.

http://jbiowh.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/33.jpg
